analyzed: shes pa 'di ni sngon po'i yul can nyid kyi 'jug pa yin no //

analyzed: sngon po ma yin pa bkag pa zhes bya ba 'di ni sngon po'i ci yang ma yin pa'i phyir ji ltar de rtogs pas sngon po'i yul can nyid du 'gyur /

analyzed: dgag pa yang ma yin te /

analyzed: de'i rang bzhin ma yin pa'i phyir ro //

original: 'di ni ldog pa'i yul can yin la ldog pa gang yin pa de nyid log pa yin no //

original: de'ang 'dir / de bzhin du kho nar rtogs par byed //
analyzed: de'ang 'dir / de bzhin du kho nar rtogs par byed //

original: ji ltar tha dad pa'i yul can gyi shes pa de tha dad pa'i sgo nas rtogs par byed pa de bzhin du /
analyzed: ji ltar tha dad pa'i yul can gyi shes pa de tha dad pa'i sgo nas rtogs par byed pa de bzhin du /

analyzed: sngon po la sogs pa'i shes pa yang yin te /

analyzed: 'di ltar de dag gis kyang rnam par gcod pa yul du byed pa yin no //

original: rang gi don la tha dad blo //

analyzed: bye brag med phyir 'jug khyad yin //

original: tha dad pa zhes bya ba dngos po'i rang gi bdag nyid rnam par gnas pa las gzhan pa ni med do //

original: de la dngos po gzhan med do zhes bkag kyang de'i khyad par 'ga' yang brjod pa med pa'i phyir te /
analyzed: de la dngos po gzhan med do zhes bkag kyang de'i khyad par 'ga' yang brjod pa med pa'i phyir te /
translated: Even though it is denied that there is another entity, still, since no distinction of it is expressed,

original: rang gi bdag nyid la rnam par gnas ba'i dngos po @287a * //
analyzed: rang gi bdag nyid la rnam par gnas ba'i dngos po @287a * //
translated: the intrinsic identity of an entity that is present in itself

original: nyid la de skad brjod pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: nyid la de skad brjod pa'i phyir ro //
translated: is called that.

original: des na tha dad pa rtogs pas rang bzhin nyid rtogs par bya ba yin pa'i phyir don tha mi dad pa nyid na rtogs pa du mar mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: des na tha dad pa rtogs pas rang bzhin nyid rtogs par bya ba yin pa'i phyir don tha mi dad pa nyid na rtogs pa du mar mi 'gyur ro //
translated: Therefore, since the intrinsic identity is understood through the understanding of difference, there is no multiplicity of cognitions even when the objects are not different, because the intrinsic identity is understood through the understanding of difference.

original: 'o na ji ltar tha dad ce na /
analyzed: 'o na ji ltar tha dad ce na /
translated: How then are they different?

original: byad pa tha dad pa'i phyir ro zhes smra'o //
analyzed: byad pa tha dad pa'i phyir ro zhes smra'o //

original: rang gi bdag nyid tsam la rnam par gnas pa'i dngos po gzhan dang ma 'dres pa'i lus kyi dngos po rang gi rgyu nyid las byung yang /
analyzed: rang gi bdag nyid tsam la rnam par gnas pa'i dngos po gzhan dang ma 'dres pa'i lus kyi dngos po rang gi rgyu nyid las byung yang /
translated: Even though a thing that exists in its own nature, a body that is not mixed with other things, arises from its own causes,

original: log pa'i shes pas rnam pa gzhan du rtogs pas dngos po gzhan gyi bdag nyid du byas pa gang yin pa de bsal bas rtogs par byed pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: log pa'i shes pas rnam pa gzhan du rtogs pas dngos po gzhan gyi bdag nyid du byas pa gang yin pa de bsal bas rtogs par byed pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it is conceived in a different aspect by a mistaken consciousness, it is made into the nature of another thing.

original: de'i phyir de ltar sre bar byed pa'i shes pa sel bas rang bzhin rtogs pa ni gzhan sel ba'i yul can yin no //
analyzed: de'i phyir de ltar sre bar byed pa'i shes pa sel bas rang bzhin rtogs pa ni gzhan sel ba'i yul can yin no //
translated: Therefore, the understanding of a nature that is produced by the exclusion of the consciousness that produces such a conception is an object of other-exclusion.

original: gal te don tha dad pa med pa dang tha dad pa la 'khrul ba la ltos te shes pa tha dad pa dang tha mi dad pa skye ba na /
analyzed: gal te don tha dad pa med pa dang tha dad pa la 'khrul ba la ltos te shes pa tha dad pa dang tha mi dad pa skye ba na /
translated: If a different or non-different consciousness arises in dependence on a different or non-different object,

original: rtogs par 'gyur ba'i rang bzhin la tha dad pa 'am tha mi dad par ji ltar rtogs te /
analyzed: rtogs par 'gyur ba'i rang bzhin la tha dad pa 'am tha mi dad par ji ltar rtogs te /
translated: how can the nature that is understood be either different or non-different?

original: de ni de la med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de ni de la med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it does not exist in that.

original: gcig la du ma 'am /
analyzed: gcig la du ma 'am /
translated: But it is not that a multiplicity exists in a unity,

original: du ma la gcig yod pa ni ma yin no //
analyzed: du ma la gcig yod pa ni ma yin no //
translated: or that a unity exists in a multiplicity.

original: tha mi dad pa la tha mi dad par rtogs na yang tha mi dad pa'i shes pa tha dad pa'i sgro 'dogs rnam par gcod pa'i 'bras bu can de mi 'gyur ba ni phyir tha dad pa'i yul can nyid ma yin no //
analyzed: tha mi dad pa la tha mi dad par rtogs na yang tha mi dad pa'i shes pa tha dad pa'i sgro 'dogs rnam par gcod pa'i 'bras bu can de mi 'gyur ba ni phyir tha dad pa'i yul can nyid ma yin no //
translated: If a non-difference is cognized as a non-difference, then it is not a cognition of a difference, because it has the effect of eliminating the superimposition of a difference.

original: de bzhin du tha dad pa tha dad pa nyid du rtogs pa tha dad pa'i shes pa'i rten du gyur pa la tha mi dad pa'i sgro 'dogs rnam par gcod par byed pa nyid kyis tha dad pa'i don can nyid ma yin no zhe na /
analyzed: de bzhin du tha dad pa tha dad pa nyid du rtogs pa tha dad pa'i shes pa'i rten du gyur pa la tha mi dad pa'i sgro 'dogs rnam par gcod par byed pa nyid kyis tha dad pa'i don can nyid ma yin no zhe na /
translated: In the same way, if a difference is cognized as a difference, then it is not a cognition of a difference, because it has the effect of eliminating the superimposition of a non-difference.

original: 'dir brjod pa /
analyzed: 'dir brjod pa /
translated: Here we say:

original: tha dad rjes mthun lag pa'i don //
analyzed: tha dad rjes mthun lag pa'i don //
translated: The meaning of the hand is in conformity with the difference.

original: tha dad 'dres pa'i rang bzhin chos //
analyzed: tha dad 'dres pa'i rang bzhin chos //
translated: The nature of the mixed is the property of the difference.

original: der brten bdag gis rtogs zhes 'brel to //
analyzed: der brten bdag gis rtogs zhes 'brel to //
translated: Therefore, I cognize it.

original: rnam par rtag pas brtags pa'i chos ba lang dang / dkar po dang 'gro ba zhes bya ba de lta bu la sogs bdag ni log pa'i don yin te /
analyzed: rnam par rtag pas brtags pa'i chos ba lang dang / dkar po dang 'gro ba zhes bya ba de lta bu la sogs bdag ni log pa'i don yin te /
translated: The object of the false is the dharma that is imagined by the imagination, such as a cow, white, going, etc.

original: phyi rol med pa'i phyir dang / rtog pa tsam la brten pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: phyi rol med pa'i phyir dang / rtog pa tsam la brten pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because there is no external object, and because it is based on mere imagination.

original: tha dad pa'i rjes su mthun pas na tha dad pa dang 'dres pa'i rang bzhin gyi chos de dag gis shes pa de ldog pa'i yul can yin no //
analyzed: tha dad pa'i rjes su mthun pas na tha dad pa dang 'dres pa'i rang bzhin gyi chos de dag gis shes pa de ldog pa'i yul can yin no //
translated: The consciousness that has that object is the subject that is turned away from those dharmas that have the nature of being different and mixed, because it is in conformity with the difference.

original: ji ltar 'khrul ba tha dad pa las gcig la tha dad pa tha dad pa dag dang / 'khrul ba gcig las tha mi dad pa yin pa de bzhin du ngo bo yang tha dad pa dang 'dres par rtogs pa yin no //
analyzed: ji ltar 'khrul ba tha dad pa las gcig la tha dad pa tha dad pa dag dang / 'khrul ba gcig las tha mi dad pa yin pa de bzhin du ngo bo yang tha dad pa dang 'dres par rtogs pa yin no //
translated: Just as, from different errors, one thing is different from different things, and from one error is not different, so also the nature is understood as different and mixed.

original: 'di ltar @287b dkar po ma yin pa dang ba la dam yin pa'i 'khrul pa'i gzhir gyur ba gcig nyid la de bzlog pa'i 'bras bu can gyi shes pa tha dad pa 'jug pa dag rnam pa tha dad pa med par ni tha dad par mi 'gyur ro
analyzed: 'di ltar @287b dkar po ma yin pa dang ba la dam yin pa'i 'khrul pa'i gzhir gyur ba gcig nyid la de bzlog pa'i 'bras bu can gyi shes pa tha dad pa 'jug pa dag rnam pa tha dad pa med par ni tha dad par mi 'gyur ro
translated: Thus, in the case of a single entity that is the basis for the error of the non-white appearance of silver, the different cognitions that have the effect of countering that error do not have different aspects.

original: // rtogs pa'i bdag nyid kyis ni blo tha dad pa ma yin te /
analyzed: // rtogs pa'i bdag nyid kyis ni blo tha dad pa ma yin te /
translated: The cognition is not different in terms of its nature as an awareness.

original: 'on kyang 'dzin pa tha dad pa nyid las yin no //üîΩde'i phyir 'di rtogs par bya ba tha dad pa 'gog pas tha dad pa tha dad pas na /
analyzed: 'on kyang 'dzin pa tha dad pa nyid las yin no // de'i phyir 'di rtogs par bya ba tha dad pa 'gog pas tha dad pa tha dad pas na /
translated: However, it is different in terms of the different apprehensions.üîΩTherefore, the difference in the objects of cognition is refuted.

original: tha mi dad pa la tha dad pa'i 'khrul pa bzlog pa yin no //
analyzed: tha mi dad pa la tha dad pa'i 'khrul pa bzlog pa yin no //
translated: Thus, the error of difference in the case of non-difference is countered.

original: tha dad pa la tha mi dad ba yang de bzhin no //
analyzed: tha dad pa la tha mi dad ba yang de bzhin no //
translated: The same applies to the case of difference.

original: de'i phyir tha dad pa dang 'dres pa dag de ltar tha dad pa'i rjes su mthun pa yin la /
analyzed: de'i phyir tha dad pa dang 'dres pa dag de ltar tha dad pa'i rjes su mthun pa yin la /
translated: Therefore, difference and mixture are similar in this way.

original: rnam par dbye bar bya ba dang mi mthun par rtogs pa'i phyir yang tha dad ba'i rjes su mthun pa yin no //
analyzed: rnam par dbye bar bya ba dang mi mthun par rtogs pa'i phyir yang tha dad ba'i rjes su mthun pa yin no //
translated: And because they are cognized as incompatible with what is to be differentiated, they are also similar in being different.

original: 'byed par byed pa ni rnam pa gang zhig brtags pas 'khrul pa sel bar nus pa de'i bdag nyid can du 'gyur dgos so //
analyzed: 'byed par byed pa ni rnam pa gang zhig brtags pas 'khrul pa sel bar nus pa de'i bdag nyid can du 'gyur dgos so //
translated: The distinguisher must be of the nature of that which is able to eliminate error by examining any aspect.

analyzed: des na ba lang ma yin par sgro 'dogs pa zlog par byed pa ni ba lang du rtogs par byed pa yin te /
translated: Therefore, the distinguisher of the superimposition that a cow is not is the realization of a cow.

original: de'i phyir rnam pa gcig la ba lang gi rnam pa nyid tha dad pa yin la /
analyzed: de'i phyir rnam pa gcig la ba lang gi rnam pa nyid tha dad pa yin la /
translated: Therefore, in one aspect, the aspect of a cow itself is different.

original: tha dad pa 'dres pa de nyid yin no //
analyzed: tha dad pa 'dres pa de nyid yin no //
translated: That difference is a mixture.

original: de'i phyir tha dad pa dang tha mi dad par rtogs pa dag ni tha dad pa'i sa bon can yin te /
analyzed: de'i phyir tha dad pa dang tha mi dad par rtogs pa dag ni tha dad pa'i sa bon can yin te /
translated: Therefore, the realizations of difference and non-difference have the seed of difference.

original: gang zhig gang la med pa de sgro 'dogs par byed pa ni 'khrul pa yin la /
analyzed: gang zhig gang la med pa de sgro 'dogs par byed pa ni 'khrul pa yin la /
translated: That which is absent in something is superimposed by error.

original: de zlog pa yang rnam par rtog pa yin pa'i phyir tha dad pa'i sa bon can yin no //
analyzed: de zlog pa yang rnam par rtog pa yin pa'i phyir tha dad pa'i sa bon can yin no //
translated: Its reversal is also conceptual, so it has the seed of difference.

original: de skad du phan tshun du tha dad pa 'di'i sa bon yin zhes bshad do //
analyzed: de skad du phan tshun du tha dad pa 'di'i sa bon yin zhes bshad do //
translated: Thus, it is said that this has the seed of difference.

original: de lta na yang 'khrul pa'i rnam pa'i gnyen po nyid kyis de zlog par byed pa tha dad pa dang 'dres pa lta bu'i khyad par can gyi rnam ba rtog bar byed pas de las bzlog pa'i dngos po de'i bdag nyid kyis rtogs par ji ltar 'gyur /

translated: Still, since it is the antidote to the aspect of error, it is as if it were different from and mixed with the object that it is to be averted. Therefore, how could it be understood to be the nature of that object that it is to avert?

original: don ji lta bu de lta bu'i rnam pa can gyi shes pa ni de gsal bar byed pa'i rang bzhin nyid kyis de rtogs par 'gyur ba yin na /
analyzed: don ji lta bu de lta bu'i rnam pa can gyi shes pa ni de gsal bar byed pa'i rang bzhin nyid kyis de rtogs par 'gyur ba yin na /
translated: If a consciousness that has the aspect of an object as it is were to understand that object, it would do so by virtue of its being the clarifier of that object.

original: tha mi dad pa'i don la tha dad par 'dzin pa dang / tha dad pa la tha mi dad par shes pa go ci ltar de'i yul can yin /
analyzed: tha mi dad pa'i don la tha dad par 'dzin pa dang / tha dad pa la tha mi dad par shes pa go ci ltar de'i yul can yin /
translated: But how could a consciousness that apprehends a nondifferent object as different and a different object as nondifferent be the subject of that object?

original: de'i phyir ji ltar gzhan bzlog pa'i sgo nas rtogs ba 'di don gyi yul can yin zhe na /
analyzed: de'i phyir ji ltar gzhan bzlog pa'i sgo nas rtogs ba 'di don gyi yul can yin zhe na /
translated: Therefore, how could this understanding that occurs through the exclusion of other be the subject of the object?

original: de ni bden te /
analyzed: de ni bden te /
translated: This is true.

original: de nyid kyi phyir /
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir /
translated: For that very reason,

original: de ni de don can min te //
analyzed: de ni de don can min te //
translated: it is not the subject of that object.üîΩIt is mistaken with regard to that object.

original: de dag tu 'khrul der nges pa //
analyzed: de dag tu 'khrul der nges pa //
translated: It is ascertained with regard to that.

original: de yi blo la brten phyir ro //
analyzed: de yi blo la brten phyir ro //
translated: It is because it is based on the mind that understands that object.

original: shes pa de ni tha dad pa @288a * //
analyzed: shes pa de ni tha dad pa @288a * //
translated: That cognition is the opposite of a thing that has the nature of a form that is either different or mixed.

original: dang 'dres pa'i rnam pa'i bdag nyid kyis na de las bzlog pa'i dngos po'i yul can bsal pa yin te /
analyzed: dang 'dres pa'i rnam pa'i bdag nyid kyis na de las bzlog pa'i dngos po'i yul can bsal pa yin te /
translated: It is the exclusion of that.

original: tha dad pa dang 'dres pa'i rang bzhin du 'khrul pa nyid do //
analyzed: tha dad pa dang 'dres pa'i rang bzhin du 'khrul pa nyid do //
translated: It is the error that has the nature of being either different or mixed.

original: de lta mod kyi nya phyis la dngul gyi rnam pa ltar 'di de la de'i bdag nyid rnam pa thams cad du 'khrul pa ni ma yin te /
analyzed: de lta mod kyi nya phyis la dngul gyi rnam pa ltar 'di de la de'i bdag nyid rnam pa thams cad du 'khrul pa ni ma yin te /
translated: However, it is not the case that this is completely mistaken with regard to that, like a mother-of-pearl shell is mistaken for a silver coin.

original: yod pa'i don gyi blo la brten pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: yod pa'i don gyi blo la brten pa'i phyir ro //
translated: This is because the cognition of an existent object is based on it.

original: 'di ltar sngon po nyams su myong ba'i 'du byed kyi mthu las byung ba'i sngon po'i rnam par rtog pa ni /
analyzed: 'di ltar sngon po nyams su myong ba'i 'du byed kyi mthu las byung ba'i sngon po'i rnam par rtog pa ni /
translated: Thus, the conception of blue that arises from the power of the formative forces that experience blue

original: tshal dmigs pa dang / dngos po gzhan dang 'dres pa de'i rang bzhin yul du byed pa yin no //
analyzed: tshal dmigs pa dang / dngos po gzhan dang 'dres pa de'i rang bzhin yul du byed pa yin no //
translated: takes as its object a forest and the nature of a thing that is mixed with other things.

original: de'i phyir 'di ni sngon po nyid rtogs pa yin no //
analyzed: de'i phyir 'di ni sngon po nyid rtogs pa yin no //
translated: Therefore, it is the understanding of blue itself.

original: de'i phyi rol gyi sngon po dang ni mi mthun te /
analyzed: de'i phyi rol gyi sngon po dang ni mi mthun te /
translated: It is not the same as the external blue.

original: tha dad pa dang 'dres pa dag dang / long ba dang 'on pa la sogs pa med par thal bar mi 'gyur ba'i rgyu mtshan sngon po rtogs par khyad med kyang /
analyzed: tha dad pa dang 'dres pa dag dang / long ba dang 'on pa la sogs pa med par thal bar mi 'gyur ba'i rgyu mtshan sngon po rtogs par khyad med kyang /
translated: because there is no reason why it should not follow that there is no difference between the blind and the deaf, etc.,

original: mngon sum dang mngon sum ma yin pa'i rgyu snang ba tha dad pa'i yang phyir ro //
analyzed: mngon sum dang mngon sum ma yin pa'i rgyu snang ba tha dad pa'i yang phyir ro //
translated: and because the cause of the direct perception and the non-direct perception is the difference in the appearance.

original: dper na mi gser gyi nad dang ldan pas dung nyid rtogs pas de la ser por gcod pa phyi rol gyi dang mi 'dra ba'i phyir de rtogs pa ma yin pa bzhin no //
analyzed: dper na mi gser gyi nad dang ldan pas dung nyid rtogs pas de la ser por gcod pa phyi rol gyi dang mi 'dra ba'i phyir de rtogs pa ma yin pa bzhin no //
translated: For example, a man who has jaundice perceives a conch shell as yellow, but that is not a perception of a conch shell, because it is not like the external one.

original: gal te sngon po'i rnam par rtog pa dang ser por snang ba de'i dngos po'i yul can ma yin pa de lta na yang /
analyzed: gal te sngon po'i rnam par rtog pa dang ser por snang ba de'i dngos po'i yul can ma yin pa de lta na yang /
translated: Even if the concept of blue and the appearance of yellow do not have an external thing as their object,

original: ser por snang ba ni phyi rol gyi dngos po'i yul nges par byed pa ma yin no //
analyzed: ser por snang ba ni phyi rol gyi dngos po'i yul nges par byed pa ma yin no //

translated: If it were the knower of the meaning of certainty, that would be so.

original: rig pa ma yin pas ji skad brjod pa'i lta ba ngan pa zlog par byed pa dag rang gi bdag nyid rig par byed par 'dod do //
analyzed: rig pa ma yin pas ji skad brjod pa'i lta ba ngan pa zlog par byed pa dag rang gi bdag nyid rig par byed par 'dod do //
translated: But because it is not a knower, it is held that it reveals itself by eliminating the bad views described above.

original: ji ltar rig pa ma yin na /
analyzed: ji ltar rig pa ma yin na /
translated: How is it not a knower?

original: zla ba gnyis la sogs pa ltar snang ba med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: zla ba gnyis la sogs pa ltar snang ba med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because there is no appearance, like the appearance of two moons and so on.

original: don rig par byed pa rnam par rtog pa med pas don rtogs pa ni rnam pa gzhan yin la /
analyzed: don rig par byed pa rnam par rtog pa med pas don rtogs pa ni rnam pa gzhan yin la /
translated: The realization of the object is different from the nonconceptual cognition of the object.

original: rnam par rtog pas rtogs pa yang gzhan yin te /
analyzed: rnam par rtog pas rtogs pa yang gzhan yin te /
translated: The realization by conceptual cognition is different.

original: de lta ma yin na mngon sum dang mngon sum ma yin par rtogs pa med par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de lta ma yin na mngon sum dang mngon sum ma yin par rtogs pa med par 'gyur ro //
translated: If it were not so, there would be no realization by direct perception and no realization by nondirect perception.

original: de'i phyir rig par bya ba ji lta ba bzhin gyi don la don du rtogs par byed pa de nyid don rtogs pa yin te /
analyzed: de'i phyir rig par bya ba ji lta ba bzhin gyi don la don du rtogs par byed pa de nyid don rtogs pa yin te /
translated: Therefore, the very cognition of the object as an object in accordance with the object to be cognized is the realization of the object.

original: dper na gang la sngon po gsal ba de nyid sngon po rtogs pa yin pa bzhin no //
analyzed: dper na gang la sngon po gsal ba de nyid sngon po rtogs pa yin pa bzhin no //
translated: For example, the very cognition of blue is the realization of blue.

original: 'di ltar / de lta'i don ni med kyang bla //
analyzed: 'di ltar / de lta'i don ni med kyang bla //
translated: Thus, even if there is no such object,

original: don gyi yul can grub pa yin //
analyzed: don gyi yul can grub pa yin //
translated: the object-possessor is established.

original: shes las rnam gzhan rtogs pa ni //
analyzed: shes las rnam gzhan rtogs pa ni //
translated: The realization of an object different from cognition

original: de lta'i don kyang dngos blo min //
analyzed: de lta'i don kyang dngos blo min //
translated: is not the cognition of an object.üîΩThe realization of an object that is not negated

original: don gyi yul gyi dngos po la gnod pa med pa'i rtogs pa gang @290a * //
analyzed: don gyi yul gyi dngos po la gnod pa med pa'i rtogs pa gang @290a * //
translated: with regard to the entity of the object-domain

original: yin pa de ni ci ltar snang ba'i don yod pas de rtogs pa nyid du grub pa ni yod pa'i don rtogs par 'gyur ba yin no //
analyzed: yin pa de ni ci ltar snang ba'i don yod pas de rtogs pa nyid du grub pa ni yod pa'i don rtogs par 'gyur ba yin no //
translated: Since the object that appears in that way exists, the cognition of it is established as the cognition of an existent object.

original: med na ni don rtogs pa nyid 'khrul pa yin te /
analyzed: med na ni don rtogs pa nyid 'khrul pa yin te /
translated: If it does not exist, the cognition of the object is mistaken,

original: don med par rab rib la sogs pas de ltar bskyed pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: don med par rab rib la sogs pas de ltar bskyed pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it is produced by such things as cataracts, although the object does not exist.

original: rtogs pa de dang mi mthun par snang ba ni de lta bu'i don yod kyang don rtogs pa ma yin te //
analyzed: rtogs pa de dang mi mthun par snang ba ni de lta bu'i don yod kyang don rtogs pa ma yin te //
translated: Even though the object exists in that way, the appearance that is incompatible with that cognition is not the cognition of the object,

original: rjes su dpag pa'i shes pa bzhin no //
analyzed: rjes su dpag pa'i shes pa bzhin no //
translated: like the cognition of inference.

original: de'i phyir gal te rnam par rtog pa don med kyang don du zhe na pa'i rang bzhin don rtogs pa nyid yin na rmi lam du dmigs pa'i rnam par rtog pa med pa sngon po gsal ba ltar sngon por rnam par rtog pa sngon por rig par 'gyurüîΩba yin no //
analyzed: de'i phyir gal te rnam par rtog pa don med kyang don du zhe na pa'i rang bzhin don rtogs pa nyid yin na rmi lam du dmigs pa'i rnam par rtog pa med pa sngon po gsal ba ltar sngon por rnam par rtog pa sngon por rig par 'gyur ba yin no //
translated: Therefore, if the conceptual cognition is meaningless, but the nature of the cognition of the object is the cognition of the object, then just as the conceptual cognition of blue in a dream is not the cognition of blue, the conceptual cognition of blue in a dream would be the cognition of blue.

original: de'i phyir 'di la ni 'khrul kyang don rtogs pa med do //
analyzed: de'i phyir 'di la ni 'khrul kyang don rtogs pa med do //
translated: Therefore, in this case, even though there is error, there is no cognition of the object.

original: blo la ji ltar don snang ba //
analyzed: blo la ji ltar don snang ba //
translated: The appearance of the object to cognition

original: de ltar sngon po dngos po nyid //
analyzed: de ltar sngon po dngos po nyid //
translated: Thus, blue is a real thing.

original: de yod na yang ci bzhin du //
analyzed: de yod na yang ci bzhin du //
translated: And even if it exists,

original: snang dang 'gal te dngos blo min //
analyzed: snang dang 'gal te dngos blo min //
translated: it is not a cognition of a real thing, because it is contradicted by the appearance.

original: ci ste yang sngon po ni don byed nus pa'i dngos po yin la /
analyzed: ci ste yang sngon po ni don byed nus pa'i dngos po yin la /
translated: But if you say that blue is a real thing that is able to perform a function,

original: rnam par rtog pa la yang de ltar rtog pa yod pa'i phyir de nyid dngos por zhen pa yin no //
analyzed: rnam par rtog pa la yang de ltar rtog pa yod pa'i phyir de nyid dngos por zhen pa yin no //
translated: and that because it is conceived in that way in thought, it is conceived as a real thing,

original: bdag ni de lta ma yin pa'i phyir te bdag gi yul can ma yin la /
analyzed: bdag ni de lta ma yin pa'i phyir te bdag gi yul can ma yin la /
translated: that is not so, because the self is not the object of that thought,

original: de lta bur gyur pa yang med pa'i phyir med pa snang ba yin no //
analyzed: de lta bur gyur pa yang med pa'i phyir med pa snang ba yin no //
translated: and because there is no such thing as the self. Therefore, the appearance of the self is a non-existent appearance.

original: de ni ma yin te /
analyzed: de ni ma yin te /
translated: That is not so.

original: gang gi phyir sngon po don byed par nus pa'i dngos po yin no zhes gang las rtogs //
analyzed: gang gi phyir sngon po don byed par nus pa'i dngos po yin no zhes gang las rtogs //
translated: Because from what is it known that blue is a real thing that is able to perform a function?

original: 'di de ltar tshad mas rtogs pa'i phyir ro zhe na /
analyzed: 'di de ltar tshad mas rtogs pa'i phyir ro zhe na /
translated: If you say that it is known because it is cognized by valid cognition in that way,

original: 'o na de la ci lta bur gyur pa nyid du snang ba de lta bur gyur pa nyid dngos po de yin la de lta bur gyur ba nyid ni snang ba'i blo yin no //
analyzed: 'o na de la ci lta bur gyur pa nyid du snang ba de lta bur gyur pa nyid dngos po de yin la de lta bur gyur ba nyid ni snang ba'i blo yin no //
translated: then the real thing is just that which appears in that way to the cognition, and that which appears in that way is the cognition of the appearance.

original: rnam par rtog pa'i blo la ni de ltar snang pa med de /
analyzed: rnam par rtog pa'i blo la ni de ltar snang pa med de /
translated: But the conceptual mind does not perceive it in that way.

original: de'i phyir de dngos po ma yin pa la de dngos po shes pa yang ma yin no //
analyzed: de'i phyir de dngos po ma yin pa la de dngos po shes pa yang ma yin no //
translated: Therefore, it is not a cognition of an existent thing in regard to a non-existent thing.

original: rmi lam na ni de ltar snang ba yod pa'i phyir de dngos po shes pa yin no //
analyzed: rmi lam na ni de ltar snang ba yod pa'i phyir de dngos po shes pa yin no //
translated: But in a dream, since it appears in that way, it is a cognition of an existent thing.

original: gal te dngos po grub na ni dngos po yod pa la yin la /
analyzed: gal te dngos po grub na ni dngos po yod pa la yin la /
translated: If the thing were established, it would be in regard to an existent thing.

original: de med pa'i phyir ni dngos po med pa la rnam par shes ba 'khrul ba nyid do //
analyzed: de med pa'i phyir ni dngos po med pa la rnam par shes ba 'khrul ba nyid do //
translated: But since it does not exist, the consciousness is mistaken in regard to a non-existent thing.

original: rnam par rtog pa'i shes pa pa de ltar snang ba dang mi mthun pa nyid kyis dngos po rtogs pa ma yin ba las /
analyzed: rnam par rtog pa'i shes pa pa de ltar snang ba dang mi mthun pa nyid kyis dngos po rtogs pa ma yin ba las /
translated: The conceptual consciousness does not cognize the thing because it does not accord with the appearance.

original: gal te sngon po yod pa la de ltar 'dzin nus na 'di dngos po'i blor 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gal te sngon po yod pa la de ltar 'dzin nus na 'di dngos po'i blor 'gyur ro //
translated: If it were able to apprehend the existent blue in that way, it would be a cognition of an existent thing.

original: de ltar ni ma yin te /üîΩde snang na rang gi ngo bo ci lta ba bzhin snang ba'i phyir /
analyzed: de ltar ni ma yin te / de snang na rang gi ngo bo ci lta ba bzhin snang ba'i phyir /
translated: But that is not the case.üîΩIf it appeared, it would appear just as it is in reality.

original: @290b gsal ba mtshon pa'i snang ba skye bar thal bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: @290b gsal ba mtshon pa'i snang ba skye bar thal bar 'gyur ro //
translated: It follows that the appearance that reveals it would arise.

original: rgyu tha dad pa'i phyir snang ba tha dad do zhe na /
analyzed: rgyu tha dad pa'i phyir snang ba tha dad do zhe na /
translated: If you say that the difference in appearance is due to the difference in cause,

original: rgyu tha dad la 'gal te de //
analyzed: rgyu tha dad la 'gal te de //
translated: then there is a contradiction in the difference of cause,

original: snang na blo dbye gang las yin //
analyzed: snang na blo dbye gang las yin //
translated: because if it appears, from what is the difference of cognition?

original: gal te sgra 'am blo las rig par bya ba la blo tha dad par byas na de sdang ba med par thal bar 'gyur ro //üîΩde'i blo skyes pa la de snang ba'i phyir de yul du 'gyur ba yin no //
analyzed: gal te sgra 'am blo las rig par bya ba la blo tha dad par byas na de sdang ba med par thal bar 'gyur ro // de'i blo skyes pa la de snang ba'i phyir de yul du 'gyur ba yin no //
translated: If it is known from sound or from cognition, then the difference of cognition is made.

original: gal te de snang na blo tha dad pa ga las yin /
analyzed: gal te de snang na blo tha dad pa ga las yin /
translated: If it appears, then from what is the difference of cognition?

original: des na gang gi tshe snang ba'i don snang bar mi bzod pa des na 'di dngos po'i blo ma yin no //
analyzed: des na gang gi tshe snang ba'i don snang bar mi bzod pa des na 'di dngos po'i blo ma yin no //
translated: Therefore, when the object of appearance is not able to appear, then this is not the cognition of an entity.

original: dngos po rtogs pa med na ni //
analyzed: dngos po rtogs pa med na ni //
translated: If there is no realization of an entity,

original: gang las rang bdag dmigs ma yin //
analyzed: gang las rang bdag dmigs ma yin //
translated: then from what is the self-nature perceived?

original: gang gi tshe de ltar dngos po'i blo med pa de'i tshe dngos por zhen pas nyams su myong bas grub pa gang zhig yin /
analyzed: gang gi tshe de ltar dngos po'i blo med pa de'i tshe dngos por zhen pas nyams su myong bas grub pa gang zhig yin /
translated: When there is no cognition of an entity in this way, then what is established by the experience of attachment to an entity?

original: gang gis bdag gi yul can nyid du mi 'gyur /
analyzed: gang gis bdag gi yul can nyid du mi 'gyur /
translated: By what is it not the subject of self?

original: des na / gang snang de 'dir bdag nyid de //
analyzed: des na / gang snang de 'dir bdag nyid de //
translated: Therefore, whatever appears here is that self.

original: gzhan gang de ni mi snang nyid //
analyzed: gzhan gang de ni mi snang nyid //
translated: But the other is not seen.

original: dngul sogs snang dang nyi phyis las //
analyzed: dngul sogs snang dang nyi phyis las //
translated: Silver and so on are seen and polished,

original: gzhan nyid du yang rtogs pa yin //
analyzed: gzhan nyid du yang rtogs pa yin //
translated: But they are also known to be different.

original: sngon po'i rang bzhin de la snang ba'i phyir de shes pa nyid du mi 'gal lo //
analyzed: sngon po'i rang bzhin de la snang ba'i phyir de shes pa nyid du mi 'gal lo //
translated: It is not contradictory that it is the cognition of that, because the nature of blue appears to it.

original: phyi rol du zhen pa gang yin pa de ni rig par bya ba ma yin pa'i phyir de lta bur gyur pa med pas med pa'i yul can nyid du mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: phyi rol du zhen pa gang yin pa de ni rig par bya ba ma yin pa'i phyir de lta bur gyur pa med pas med pa'i yul can nyid du mi 'gyur ro //
translated: But the object that is conceived as external is not an object of cognition, because it does not exist in that way. Therefore, it is not that the cognition has a nonexistent object.

original: gal te mi gsal bar snang bas dngos po rig pa ma yin na /
analyzed: gal te mi gsal bar snang bas dngos po rig pa ma yin na /
translated: If it is not a cognition of an object because it appears unclearly,

original: thag ring por don rnams de ltar rtogs pa'i phyir dbang po'i shes pa dngos po'i yul can ma yin par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: thag ring por don rnams de ltar rtogs pa'i phyir dbang po'i shes pa dngos po'i yul can ma yin par 'gyur ro //
translated: then the sensory cognition would not have an object, because objects are understood in that way at a distance.

original: dngos po'i yul can ma yin pa kho na'o zhe na /
analyzed: dngos po'i yul can ma yin pa kho na'o zhe na /
translated: If you say that it does not have an object at all,

original: mi gsal bar snang bas zla ba gnyis la sogs pa dang mi mthun par shes pa 'di rnam par rtog pa bzhin du 'khrul pas dngos po rig par yang mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: mi gsal bar snang bas zla ba gnyis la sogs pa dang mi mthun par shes pa 'di rnam par rtog pa bzhin du 'khrul pas dngos po rig par yang mi 'gyur ro //
translated: then this cognition that is not in accord with the appearance of two moons and so on, like a conceptual cognition, would be mistaken, and it would not be a cognition of an object.

original: ma yin te /
analyzed: ma yin te /
translated: No, it is not.

original: thag ring po ma yin pa dang bskal bar mi gsal bar snang ba nyid kyis nye bar mtshon pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: thag ring po ma yin pa dang bskal bar mi gsal bar snang ba nyid kyis nye bar mtshon pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it is not far away, and because it is not clear, as indicated by the appearance.

original: 'di 'ba' zhig ni khyad par ma yin te /
analyzed: 'di 'ba' zhig ni khyad par ma yin te /
translated: This is not the only difference.

original: 'dir mi mthun pa nyid ni nyams su myong bas grub pa nyid do //
analyzed: 'dir mi mthun pa nyid ni nyams su myong bas grub pa nyid do //
translated: Here, the difference is established by experience.

original: de lta ma yin na /
analyzed: de lta ma yin na /
translated: Otherwise,

original: thag ring po nas sngon po dmigs pa dang / de nyid du rtog pa dbang po'i byed pa 'jug pa la mthong ba dang brtags pa nyid du rnam par phye nas rtogs par mi 'gyur ro //üîΩde'i phyir mi gsal bar snang yang rnam par rtog pa dang mi mthun pa zla ba gnyis bzhin du 'di ni sngon po @291a * //
analyzed: thag ring po nas sngon po dmigs pa dang / de nyid du rtog pa dbang po'i byed pa 'jug pa la mthong ba dang brtags pa nyid du rnam par phye nas rtogs par mi 'gyur ro // de'i phyir mi gsal bar snang yang rnam par rtog pa dang mi mthun pa zla ba gnyis bzhin du 'di ni sngon po @291a * //
translated: if it were not so, then when blue is perceived from a distance, and when it is examined right there, the operation of the sense faculty would not be understood as distinguished as seeing and examining.

original: rtogs pa nyid yin no //
analyzed: rtogs pa nyid yin no //
translated: Therefore, even though it appears unclear, it is the cognition of blue, like the cognition of two moons, even though it is not in accord with the conception.

original: de ltar rnam par rtog pa la dngos po rtogs pa 'ga' yang med pas na rnam pa de lta bu'i dngos po med pa'i phyir med pa'i yul can nyid ma yin no //
analyzed: de ltar rnam par rtog pa la dngos po rtogs pa 'ga' yang med pas na rnam pa de lta bu'i dngos po med pa'i phyir med pa'i yul can nyid ma yin no //
translated: Thus, since there is no cognition of an entity in any conception, there is no object of non-existence, because there is no such entity.

original: dngul la sogs pa la ni dngul snang ba dang / nya phyis la sogs pa las gzhan yin pa'i phyir myong ba de nya phyis kyi yul can ma yin te /
analyzed: dngul la sogs pa la ni dngul snang ba dang / nya phyis la sogs pa las gzhan yin pa'i phyir myong ba de nya phyis kyi yul can ma yin te /
translated: Silver and so on are not the object of the experience of mother-of-pearl, because they are different from mother-of-pearl.

original: 'on kyang dngul gyi yul can nyid do //
analyzed: 'on kyang dngul gyi yul can nyid do //
translated: But they are the object of silver.

original: nya phyis kyi yul nyid du de ltar rtogs pas phyin ci log tu rtogs par brjod kyi nyams su myong ba nyid kyis de ltar rtogs pa'i phyir ni ma yin te /
analyzed: nya phyis kyi yul nyid du de ltar rtogs pas phyin ci log tu rtogs par brjod kyi nyams su myong ba nyid kyis de ltar rtogs pa'i phyir ni ma yin te /
translated: It is said that the cognition is erroneous because it is understood in that way, as the object of mother-of-pearl, but not because it is understood in that way by the experience itself.

original: khyad par dang khyad par can gyi ngo bo rtogs pa med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: khyad par dang khyad par can gyi ngo bo rtogs pa med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because there is no understanding of the nature of the qualifier and the qualified.

original: rnam par rtog pa'i sngon po'i rnam pa ni shes pa la yang srid pa dang / don du nges pa don myong ba yang ma yin pa de'i phyir 'di med pa'i yul can nyid 'jug pa ma yin no //
analyzed: rnam par rtog pa'i sngon po'i rnam pa ni shes pa la yang srid pa dang / don du nges pa don myong ba yang ma yin pa de'i phyir 'di med pa'i yul can nyid 'jug pa ma yin no //
translated: The aspect of blue in a conceptual cognition is possible in consciousness, and it is not the experience of a real object. Therefore, it is not the case that this consciousness is engaged with a nonexistent object.

original: gzhan yang / de yi ngo bor snang ba las //
analyzed: gzhan yang / de yi ngo bor snang ba las //
translated: Moreover,

original: myong ba gzhan 'ga' yod ma yin //
analyzed: myong ba gzhan 'ga' yod ma yin //
translated: There is no other experienceüîΩThan the appearance of its nature.

original: don gyi ngo bor snang yang ni //
analyzed: don gyi ngo bor snang yang ni //
translated: Even though the appearance is the nature of the object,

original: de ni blo yi 'dra nyid yin //
analyzed: de ni blo yi 'dra nyid yin //
translated: It is the likeness of the cognition.

original: lhag par zhen pa don rig pa nyid yin na bdag nyid ma nges pa'i phyir yul ma yin la /
analyzed: lhag par zhen pa don rig pa nyid yin na bdag nyid ma nges pa'i phyir yul ma yin la /
translated: If the object of the cognition of the object is the self, then the self is not ascertained, and so it is not the object.

original: don nges pa'i phyir don nyid yul yin zhing /
analyzed: don nges pa'i phyir don nyid yul yin zhing /
translated: But if the object of the cognition of the object is the object, then the object is ascertained, and so it is the object.

original: de lta bu yang yod pa ma yin pa'i phyir med pa'i yul can nyid du 'gyur te /
analyzed: de lta bu yang yod pa ma yin pa'i phyir med pa'i yul can nyid du 'gyur te /
translated: But since that is not the case, the cognition would have no object.

original: de lta ma yin na de'i yul can nyid du yang mi 'grub pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de lta ma yin na de'i yul can nyid du yang mi 'grub pa'i phyir ro //
translated: If it were otherwise, it would not be established as having an object.

original: don myong ba nyid yin yang bdag yul yin par ni mi 'gal te /
analyzed: don myong ba nyid yin yang bdag yul yin par ni mi 'gal te /
translated: But even if the experience of the object is the self, it is not contradictory for the self to be the object.

original: zla ba gnyis la sogs pa'i shes pa bzhin no //
analyzed: zla ba gnyis la sogs pa'i shes pa bzhin no //
translated: It is like the cognition of two moons and so on.

original: 'di ltar myong ba zhes bya ba don gsal ba nyid ma gtogs pa gzhan ni 'ga' yang med do //
analyzed: 'di ltar myong ba zhes bya ba don gsal ba nyid ma gtogs pa gzhan ni 'ga' yang med do //
translated: In this way, apart from the mere clarity of the object, there is no other so-called experience.

original: de'i phyir gsal ba de ni don yin la /
analyzed: de'i phyir gsal ba de ni don yin la /
translated: Therefore, that clarity is the object.

original: bdag ni de las gzhan yin pa'i phyir bdag yul ma yin zhe na /
analyzed: bdag ni de las gzhan yin pa'i phyir bdag yul ma yin zhe na /
translated: But since the self is different from that, the self is not the object.

original: de lta bu med pa'i phyir yul med pa nyid yin no //
analyzed: de lta bu med pa'i phyir yul med pa nyid yin no //
translated: But since that is not the case, there is no object.

original: shes pa yang don ci lta bur gyur pa rnam pa de lta bu'i gzugs brnyan dang 'brel pas gang snang ba na snang ba 'di ni don yin no zhes brjod de /
analyzed: shes pa yang don ci lta bur gyur pa rnam pa de lta bu'i gzugs brnyan dang 'brel pas gang snang ba na snang ba 'di ni don yin no zhes brjod de /
translated: When it appears, it is said that this appearance is the object.

original: de ltar snang ba de shes pa las yang mi srid pa ni ma yin no //
analyzed: de ltar snang ba de shes pa las yang mi srid pa ni ma yin no //
translated: It is not impossible that this appearance is consciousness.

original: gal te de ltar snang ba de don gyis byas pa yin pa de lta na de ltar snang ba de don gsal ba'i rang bzhin yin pa'i phyir don rtogs pa nyid do //
analyzed: gal te de ltar snang ba de don gyis byas pa yin pa de lta na de ltar snang ba de don gsal ba'i rang bzhin yin pa'i phyir don rtogs pa nyid do //
translated: If this appearance is produced by the object, then because the appearance is the nature of the clarity of the object, it is the realization of the object.

original: gtod par byed pa don gyi byed pa med na ni de shes pa de tsam snang bar byed de /
analyzed: gtod par byed pa don gyi byed pa med na ni de shes pa de tsam snang bar byed de /
translated: If the object does not perform the function of directing, then that consciousness is merely the appearance of that object.

original: zla ba gnyis la @291b sogs ba'i shes pa bzhin no //
analyzed: zla ba gnyis la @291b sogs ba'i shes pa bzhin no //
translated: It is like the consciousness of two moons.

original: de lta ma yin na ni rnam par rtog pa med pa'i shes pa yang don gyi rnam pa can du mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de lta ma yin na ni rnam par rtog pa med pa'i shes pa yang don gyi rnam pa can du mi 'gyur ro //
translated: If it were not so, then nonconceptual consciousness would not have the aspect of the object.

original: gal te rnam par rtog pa med pa ni snang ba don gyi rjes su 'gro ba dang ldog pa'i rjes su byed pa can yin gyi /
analyzed: gal te rnam par rtog pa med pa ni snang ba don gyi rjes su 'gro ba dang ldog pa'i rjes su byed pa can yin gyi /
translated: If it is said that nonconceptual consciousness is the appearance that follows the presence and absence of the object,

original: 'ga' yang nges pa ni ma yin no //
analyzed: 'ga' yang nges pa ni ma yin no //
translated: But it is not certain in any case.

original: des na 'di'i 'dzin pa dang mi 'dzin min snang ba la ltos pa yin no //
analyzed: des na 'di'i 'dzin pa dang mi 'dzin min snang ba la ltos pa yin no //
translated: Therefore, the apprehension and non-apprehension of this [consciousness] depend on the appearance [of the object].

original: rnam par rtog pa ni phyi rol gyi sreg pa dang rjes su 'brel ba yod pa dang med par snang ba ma yin yang phyi rol nges pa yin te /
analyzed: rnam par rtog pa ni phyi rol gyi sreg pa dang rjes su 'brel ba yod pa dang med par snang ba ma yin yang phyi rol nges pa yin te /
translated: Imagination does not appear as existent or non-existent in relation to external burning, etc., but it is certain in relation to external [objects].

original: de'i phyir nges pa nyid de'i bzung ba yin no //
analyzed: de'i phyir nges pa nyid de'i bzung ba yin no //
translated: Therefore, certainty itself is its apprehension.

original: de yang phyi rol nyid yin gyi rang gi ngo bo ni ma yin zhing /
analyzed: de yang phyi rol nyid yin gyi rang gi ngo bo ni ma yin zhing /
translated: And that is external, not its own nature.

original: rnam pa de lta bu yang med pa'i phyir yul med pa nyid do zhe na /
analyzed: rnam pa de lta bu yang med pa'i phyir yul med pa nyid do zhe na /
translated: And because there is no such aspect, there is no object.

original: 'di la bshad zin to //
analyzed: 'di la bshad zin to //
translated: This has already been explained.

original: zhen pa zhes bya ba gal te rig par byed pa ma yin na /
analyzed: zhen pa zhes bya ba gal te rig par byed pa ma yin na /
translated: If what is called attachment does not make known [the object],

original: de las yul gnas pa med pa'i phyir de la ltos nas 'dzin pa dang / 'dzin pa ma yin no //
analyzed: de las yul gnas pa med pa'i phyir de la ltos nas 'dzin pa dang / 'dzin pa ma yin no //
translated: then, because there is no object remaining from that [consciousness], apprehension and non-apprehension depend on it.

original: 'on te myong bar byed pa yin na de myong ba zhes bya ba ni zhig / de lta bur gyur pa'i don gsal bar byed pa'o //
analyzed: 'on te myong bar byed pa yin na de myong ba zhes bya ba ni zhig / de lta bur gyur pa'i don gsal bar byed pa'o //
translated: But if it makes experience, then that which is called experience is destroyed, and it makes known an object of that kind.

original: ji lta bur gyur pa gsal bar byed pa de lta bu nyid du gyur nas rang nyid snang ba'i phyir gang gis med pa'i yul can du 'gyur ba /
analyzed: ji lta bur gyur pa gsal bar byed pa de lta bu nyid du gyur nas rang nyid snang ba'i phyir gang gis med pa'i yul can du 'gyur ba /
translated: Just as it is, it appears to itself, so how can it be a cognition that has a nonexistent object?

original: blo gros ngan pas brtags pa'i dngos po med pa snang ba zhes bya ba 'di bzung ba'i rnam pa las dpag pa ci yod /
analyzed: blo gros ngan pas brtags pa'i dngos po med pa snang ba zhes bya ba 'di bzung ba'i rnam pa las dpag pa ci yod /
translated: What can be inferred from the appearance of a nonexistent thing imagined by a bad intellect?

original: gal te de lta na rtog pa med pa dang khyad par med par thal bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gal te de lta na rtog pa med pa dang khyad par med par thal bar 'gyur ro //
translated: If that is so, then it follows that it is no different from a nonconceptual cognition.

original: bden te myong ba'i bdag nyid kyis yin no //
analyzed: bden te myong ba'i bdag nyid kyis yin no //
translated: That is true, but it is due to its nature of experience.

original: khyad par ni myong ba'i rang bzhin ma yin pa zhen pa nyid las yin no zhes 'chad par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: khyad par ni myong ba'i rang bzhin ma yin pa zhen pa nyid las yin no zhes 'chad par 'gyur ro //
translated: The difference is due to its nature of nonapprehension, which will be explained later.

original: gal te shes pa'i rnam par shes pa dang tha mi dad pa'i phyir de'i dus pa nyid kyis snga ma dang phyi mar yod pa ma yin pa'i phyir dang / rang gi mtshan nyid kyi rang bzhin yin pas rjes su 'gro ba med pa'i phyir mtshams sbyor ba'i rang bzhin gyis rtogs pa mi 'jug pas rnam par rtog pa nyid du mi 'thad do //
analyzed: gal te shes pa'i rnam par shes pa dang tha mi dad pa'i phyir de'i dus pa nyid kyis snga ma dang phyi mar yod pa ma yin pa'i phyir dang / rang gi mtshan nyid kyi rang bzhin yin pas rjes su 'gro ba med pa'i phyir mtshams sbyor ba'i rang bzhin gyis rtogs pa mi 'jug pas rnam par rtog pa nyid du mi 'thad do //
translated: If it is not different from consciousness, it does not exist in the past or future because it is momentary, and it does not continue because it is essentially its own nature. Therefore, since it does not engage in the nature of connection, it is not tenable that it is conceptual.

original: gal te 'di rang rig pas rang gi bdag nyid ji lta ba bzhin snang ba de tsam gyis mthar phyin pa yin na ni de'i tshe zla ba gnyis kyi shes pa bzhin du rang gi bdag nyid la rnam par rtog pa med pa nyid do //
analyzed: gal te 'di rang rig pas rang gi bdag nyid ji lta ba bzhin snang ba de tsam gyis mthar phyin pa yin na ni de'i tshe zla ba gnyis kyi shes pa bzhin du rang gi bdag nyid la rnam par rtog pa med pa nyid do //
translated: If it is self-awareness that appears just as it is, and that is the limit of reality, then at that time, like the cognition of two moons, it would not be conceptual with regard to its own nature.

original: 'on te sngon po la sogs pa'i shes pa bzhin du myong ba'i rang bzhin de don gyi mthar thug pa nyid yin na /
analyzed: 'on te sngon po la sogs pa'i shes pa bzhin du myong ba'i rang bzhin de don gyi mthar thug pa nyid yin na /
translated: But if, like the cognition of blue and so on, it is the nature of experience that is the limit of reality,

original: de'i tshe @292a * //
analyzed: de'i tshe @292a * //
translated: then at that time,

original: ji ltar snang ba de dang tha mi dad pa'i phyir rang gi ngo bos de lta bu'i rnam pa can yin pas de gsal ba nyid du 'gyur ba'i phyir //
analyzed: ji ltar snang ba de dang tha mi dad pa'i phyir rang gi ngo bos de lta bu'i rnam pa can yin pas de gsal ba nyid du 'gyur ba'i phyir //
translated: Because it is not different from the way things appear, it has that aspect by its very nature, and therefore it is clear.

original: de lta na yang rtog pa med pa nyid do //
analyzed: de lta na yang rtog pa med pa nyid do //
translated: But even so, it is not a conceptual cognition.

original: de'i phyir sngon po'i rnam pa yod kyang rnam par rtog pa ni tha dad par snga ma dang phyi ma dang / phyi rol gyi rang bzhin du snang ba dang rjes su 'gro ba rig pa'i rang bzhin nyid du 'dod par bya ba kho na'o //
analyzed: de'i phyir sngon po'i rnam pa yod kyang rnam par rtog pa ni tha dad par snga ma dang phyi ma dang / phyi rol gyi rang bzhin du snang ba dang rjes su 'gro ba rig pa'i rang bzhin nyid du 'dod par bya ba kho na'o //
translated: Therefore, even though the aspect of blue exists, the conceptual cognition is not different from the previous and subsequent moments, and it is not the nature of the cognition that perceives the external object.

original: des na rnam par rtog pa 'di'i de rnam pa can ma yin yang de'i rig pa yin la de'i yul de 'dra ba de yang med pa'i phyir bdag nyid du gyur pa ma yin pa nyid 'di ni sgro 'dogs pa zhes bya'o zhe na /
analyzed: des na rnam par rtog pa 'di'i de rnam pa can ma yin yang de'i rig pa yin la de'i yul de 'dra ba de yang med pa'i phyir bdag nyid du gyur pa ma yin pa nyid 'di ni sgro 'dogs pa zhes bya'o zhe na /
translated: Therefore, even though this conceptual cognition does not have that as its aspect, it is the cognition of that, and the object that is similar to that does not exist, and therefore it is not the nature of the self. This is called superimposition.

original: 'di la smras pa /
analyzed: 'di la smras pa /
translated: To this we reply:

original: shes pa'i dngos por mi 'thad rnams //
analyzed: shes pa'i dngos por mi 'thad rnams //
translated: Things that are not tenable as objects of cognition

original: gal te rig na 'khrul ma yin //
analyzed: gal te rig na 'khrul ma yin //
translated: if they are cognized, they are not errors.

original: min na de dag shes par yang //
analyzed: min na de dag shes par yang //
translated: If not, then those are not cognized.

original: rnam par rtog pas ni snga ma dang phyi ma mthong ba nyid dang / tha mi dad par yul rtogs par bya ba yin te /
analyzed: rnam par rtog pas ni snga ma dang phyi ma mthong ba nyid dang / tha mi dad par yul rtogs par bya ba yin te /
translated: Conceptual thought is the cognition of an object that is not different from what was seen previously and what will be seen later.

original: de lta ma yin na de sgra'i yul nyid du mi 'grub pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de lta ma yin na de sgra'i yul nyid du mi 'grub pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Otherwise, it would not be established as the object of sound.

original: brjod par bya ba ma yin pa'i yul can nyid yin na ni rnam par rtog pa med pa nyid du thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: brjod par bya ba ma yin pa'i yul can nyid yin na ni rnam par rtog pa med pa nyid du thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
translated: If it has a non-expressible object, then it would follow, absurdly, that it is not conceptual thought.

original: de'i phyir gal te shes pa'i ngo bor mi 'thad pa'i chos de dag rig par 'dod na ni de shes pa'i ngo bor mi srid par 'gyur ba yin no //
analyzed: de'i phyir gal te shes pa'i ngo bor mi 'thad pa'i chos de dag rig par 'dod na ni de shes pa'i ngo bor mi srid par 'gyur ba yin no //
translated: Therefore, if you maintain that those phenomena which are not tenable as the nature of consciousness are cognized, then it is not possible for them to be the nature of consciousness.

original: gal te 'dir ni sngar mthong ba nyid rig par bya ba yin no //
analyzed: gal te 'dir ni sngar mthong ba nyid rig par bya ba yin no //
translated: If you say that here what is seen previously is what is cognized,

original: shes pa ni da ltar byung ba yin pa'i phyir sngar mthong ba ma yin pas de de'i rnam par rig par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: shes pa ni da ltar byung ba yin pa'i phyir sngar mthong ba ma yin pas de de'i rnam par rig par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: then since consciousness is present, it is not what was seen previously, and therefore it is not the perception of that.

original: de lta yin dang rnam par rtog pa 'khrul pa zhes bya bar mi 'thad par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de lta yin dang rnam par rtog pa 'khrul pa zhes bya bar mi 'thad par 'gyur ro //
translated: If that were the case, then it would not be tenable to call it a mistaken conceptual thought.

original: de'i phyir don med par ga la 'gyur //
analyzed: de'i phyir don med par ga la 'gyur //
translated: Therefore, how can it be meaningless?

original: gal te don sngar mthong ba de ltar rig na don nyid rig par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gal te don sngar mthong ba de ltar rig na don nyid rig par 'gyur ro //
translated: If it is known as it was previously seen, then the object itself is known.

original: rig pa de ltar zhugs kyang don gzhan rig pa zhes bya ba ni ma yin no //
analyzed: rig pa de ltar zhugs kyang don gzhan rig pa zhes bya ba ni ma yin no //
translated: Even though the cognition is engaged in that way, it is not called the cognition of another object.

original: des na mthong ba snga mas yul du byas pa rtogs pas sngon mthong zhing yul du byas pa nyid rtogs pa yin no //
analyzed: des na mthong ba snga mas yul du byas pa rtogs pas sngon mthong zhing yul du byas pa nyid rtogs pa yin no //
translated: Therefore, it is the prior perception that is cognized as the object. It is the prior perception that is cognized as the object.

original: 'on te 'di de ltar rtogs pa ni ma yin te /
analyzed: 'on te 'di de ltar rtogs pa ni ma yin te /
translated: But it is not cognized in that way.

original: de'i yul can nyid du thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de'i yul can nyid du thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it would follow, absurdly, that it would have that as its object.

original: 'o na sngar ma mthong ba'i rang bzhin du rtogs pa yin no //
analyzed: 'o na sngar ma mthong ba'i rang bzhin du rtogs pa yin no //
translated: Well then, it is cognized as having a nature that was not previously seen.

original: de lta yin dang de nyid kyis gsal ba nyid mi 'thad pa ci yod sgro 'dogs pa sngon ma mthong ba'i rang bzhin nyid la sngon mthong ba nyid du rtogs pa yin no zhe na /
analyzed: de lta yin dang de nyid kyis gsal ba nyid mi 'thad pa ci yod sgro 'dogs pa sngon ma mthong ba'i rang bzhin nyid la sngon mthong ba nyid du rtogs pa yin no zhe na /
translated: If that were the case, then why is it not tenable that it is a clarifier? It is the prior perception that is cognized as the object.

original: de ni ma yin te /
analyzed: de ni ma yin te /
translated: That is not so.

original: @292b gang gi phyir /
analyzed: @292b gang gi phyir /
translated: Because

original: 'khrul pa yin yang mi tshor min //
analyzed: 'khrul pa yin yang mi tshor min //
translated: Even though it is mistaken, it is not imperceptible.

original: sgro btags la sngon mthong ba nyid du rtogs par 'dod pas kyang sngon mthong bar rtogs pas sngon mthong ba nyid rtogs pa yin no zhes 'dod par bya'o //
analyzed: sgro btags la sngon mthong ba nyid du rtogs par 'dod pas kyang sngon mthong bar rtogs pas sngon mthong ba nyid rtogs pa yin no zhes 'dod par bya'o //
translated: Even if you assert that the superimposition is the realization of what was seen before, you must assert that it is the realization of what was seen before because it is the realization of what was seen before.

original: de lta ma yin na 'di sngon mthong ba nyid du rtogs par mi 'gyur gyi /
analyzed: de lta ma yin na 'di sngon mthong ba nyid du rtogs par mi 'gyur gyi /
translated: If that were not so, it would not be the realization of what was seen before.

original: 'on kyang sgo btags pa'i yul can nyid do //
analyzed: 'on kyang sgo btags pa'i yul can nyid do //
translated: However, it is the subject that superimposes.

original: 'khrul pa yang rnam pa ci ltar 'khrul pa de'i ngo bor rig pa yin te /
analyzed: 'khrul pa yang rnam pa ci ltar 'khrul pa de'i ngo bor rig pa yin te /
translated: Also, error is the awareness of the essence of the object in the way that it is erroneous.

original: dper na nya phyis la dngul du rtogs pas dngul tshor ba med pa ni rtogs pa ni ma yin te /
analyzed: dper na nya phyis la dngul du rtogs pas dngul tshor ba med pa ni rtogs pa ni ma yin te /
translated: For example, when a mother-of-pearl is realized to be silver, the non-sensation of silver is not realized.

original: dngul nyid du ma rig par thal ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: dngul nyid du ma rig par thal ba'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it follows that silver itself is not realized.

original: 'o na dngul gyi shes pa dngul gyi yul can nyid du 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'o na dngul gyi shes pa dngul gyi yul can nyid du 'gyur ro //
translated: Well, the consciousness of silver would be the subject of silver.

original: dngul gyi shes pa yang yin la /
analyzed: dngul gyi shes pa yang yin la /
translated: It is the consciousness of silver, but it is not the subject of silver.

original: dngul gyi yul can yang ma yin no zhes gang gis de ltar brgal zhing brtag par bya ba /
analyzed: dngul gyi yul can yang ma yin no zhes gang gis de ltar brgal zhing brtag par bya ba /
translated: By what is it to be disputed and analyzed in that way?

original: de de'i shes pa yin pa'i phyir de'i yul gzhan gang zhig yin par 'gyur /
analyzed: de de'i shes pa yin pa'i phyir de'i yul gzhan gang zhig yin par 'gyur /
translated: Because it is the cognition of that, what other object of that could there be?

original: 'o na ji ltar bdag nyid snang ba yin /
analyzed: 'o na ji ltar bdag nyid snang ba yin /
translated: Well then, how is it that it appears to itself?

original: yul dang dus des rnam par bcad pa'i phyi rol gyi dngul med pa'i phyir shes pa'i bdag nyid dngul gyi rnam par snang ba yin no zhes de rig pa dag 'dzin to //
analyzed: yul dang dus des rnam par bcad pa'i phyi rol gyi dngul med pa'i phyir shes pa'i bdag nyid dngul gyi rnam par snang ba yin no zhes de rig pa dag 'dzin to //
translated: Because there is no external silver that is excluded by that place and time, the cognition itself appears in the aspect of silver.üîΩThis is what the logicians hold.

original: 'di ni phyi rol gyi ngo bo nyid dang / snga ma dang phyi ma'i rang bzhin du rig pa gang yin pa de shes pa'i rang bzhin la mi srid pa'i phyir /
analyzed: 'di ni phyi rol gyi ngo bo nyid dang / snga ma dang phyi ma'i rang bzhin du rig pa gang yin pa de shes pa'i rang bzhin la mi srid pa'i phyir /
translated: But this is not possible for the nature of cognition, because it is known to have a nature that is different from the external entity and different from the prior and subsequent moments.

original: yul med pa nyid du blo gros ngan pa dag 'khrul pas de la de skad brjod pa yin no //
analyzed: yul med pa nyid du blo gros ngan pa dag 'khrul pas de la de skad brjod pa yin no //
translated: Therefore, the foolish are confused about the nonexistence of objects, and they say this.

original: gal te 'di snga ma dang phyi ma phyi rol gyi rang bzhin nyid rtogs pa yin na rang gi yul can du mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gal te 'di snga ma dang phyi ma phyi rol gyi rang bzhin nyid rtogs pa yin na rang gi yul can du mi 'gyur ro //
translated: If it cognizes the external nature of the prior and subsequent moments, it is not a subjective cognition.

original: de lta na yang rang gi mtshan nyid yul yin par thal lo //
analyzed: de lta na yang rang gi mtshan nyid yul yin par thal lo //
translated: Even so, it follows that its object is its own characteristic.

original: de yang 'thad pas spyad bar bya ba yin no //
analyzed: de yang 'thad pas spyad bar bya ba yin no //
translated: And that is to be experienced by means of the reasonings.

original: ci ste de ltar rig pa ma yin na 'di shes ba'i ngo bo dang mi 'gal lo //
analyzed: ci ste de ltar rig pa ma yin na 'di shes ba'i ngo bo dang mi 'gal lo //
translated: If it is not known in that way, it is not contradictory to the nature of consciousness.

original: de nyid kyi phyir sgro btags pa la phyi rol nyid du zhe na pa yang 'thad ba ma yin te /
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir sgro btags pa la phyi rol nyid du zhe na pa yang 'thad ba ma yin te /
translated: Therefore, it is not tenable to claim that the external exists in the superimposition.

original: phyi rol du rig pa ni phyi rol gyi yul can ma yin par mi 'thad pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: phyi rol du rig pa ni phyi rol gyi yul can ma yin par mi 'thad pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it is not tenable that consciousness of the external is a subject of external objects.

original: phyi rol dang mi mthun pa'i rang bzhin can yin pa'i phyir te sgro btags pa yin bar 'dod pa gang yin pa phyi rol dang mi mthun pa'i phyir de lta bu'i dngos po shes pa nyid du yang mi 'thad pa ni ma yin no //
analyzed: phyi rol dang mi mthun pa'i rang bzhin can yin pa'i phyir te sgro btags pa yin bar 'dod pa gang yin pa phyi rol dang mi mthun pa'i phyir de lta bu'i dngos po shes pa nyid du yang mi 'thad pa ni ma yin no //
translated: Because it has a nature incompatible with the external. It is not untenable that the object that is asserted to be the superimposition is consciousness itself, since it is not compatible with the external.

original: gal te de la phyi rol nyid du rtogs na shes pa nyid las 'gyur mod //
analyzed: gal te de la phyi rol nyid du rtogs na shes pa nyid las 'gyur mod //
translated: If it is understood as external, it is just consciousness.

original: 'on te sgro btags rtogs pa nyid phyi rol rtogs pa yin na phyi rol dang mi mthun pa'i yul can yin pa'i phyir phyi rol rtogs pa @293a * //
analyzed: 'on te sgro btags rtogs pa nyid phyi rol rtogs pa yin na phyi rol dang mi mthun pa'i yul can yin pa'i phyir phyi rol rtogs pa @293a * //
translated: But if the understanding of the superimposition is the understanding of the external, then it is not the understanding of the external because it has an object that is incompatible with the external.

original: ma yin par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: ma yin par 'gyur ro //
translated: It would not be.

original: gal te rnam par rtog pa'i yul shes pa'i rnam pa nyid yin na rnam par rtog pa nyid med par thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir /
analyzed: gal te rnam par rtog pa'i yul shes pa'i rnam pa nyid yin na rnam par rtog pa nyid med par thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir /
translated: If it were the aspect of the cognition of the object of conceptualization, it would follow that it would not be conceptualization itself.

original: bdag gi yul snang ba las khyad par du gyur ba'i rig pa'i bdag nyid du khas blang bar bya ba yin nam zhe na /
analyzed: bdag gi yul snang ba las khyad par du gyur ba'i rig pa'i bdag nyid du khas blang bar bya ba yin nam zhe na /
translated: Or should it be accepted that it is the nature of awareness that is distinguished from the appearance of the object?

original: de ni bden mod kyi de ltan yang //
analyzed: de ni bden mod kyi de ltan yang //
translated: This is true, but still

original: rnam pa ji lta'i don rig pas //
analyzed: rnam pa ji lta'i don rig pas //
translated: The cognition of the object in the aspect of that

original: rtogs yin de rig med pa'i phyir //
analyzed: rtogs yin de rig med pa'i phyir //
translated: Is conceptual, because it is not that cognition.

original: shes chos mngon par slob pa la //
analyzed: shes chos mngon par slob pa la //
translated: In the Abhidharma, it is said that

original: nges par brjod de bde sogs bzhin //
analyzed: nges par brjod de bde sogs bzhin //
translated: Cognition is like pleasure, etc.

original: gal te de'i rnam pa tsam gyis de gsal ba yin na rtog ba med par thal ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gal te de'i rnam pa tsam gyis de gsal ba yin na rtog ba med par thal ba'i phyir ro //
translated: If it is the manifestation of that mere aspect, it would follow that it is not conceptual.

original: rig pa bla lhag pa nyid kyis rtogs pa dang bcas par brjod par bya ba yin yang /
analyzed: rig pa bla lhag pa nyid kyis rtogs pa dang bcas par brjod par bya ba yin yang /
translated: Although it is said to be conceptual because it is distinguished by awareness,

original: de'i rnam pa ma yin par rig pa ni med de gzhan du ji skad bshad pa bzhin no //
analyzed: de'i rnam pa ma yin par rig pa ni med de gzhan du ji skad bshad pa bzhin no //
translated: it is not awareness that is not its aspect, as has been explained elsewhere.

original: rig par bya ba dang rig par byed pa dag tha dad par snang ba yang med do //
analyzed: rig par bya ba dang rig par byed pa dag tha dad par snang ba yang med do //
translated: Nor is there any appearance of a difference between the object of cognition and the cognition itself.

original: de lta mod kyi khas blangs nas kyang brjod par bya ste /
analyzed: de lta mod kyi khas blangs nas kyang brjod par bya ste /
translated: Nevertheless, we will respond to this objection, even though it is groundless.

original: rnam pa ji lta bu'i rang bzhin rig pa 'di rnam par rtog pa yin par 'dod pa de lta bu ni 'dir rig pa med do //
analyzed: rnam pa ji lta bu'i rang bzhin rig pa 'di rnam par rtog pa yin par 'dod pa de lta bu ni 'dir rig pa med do //

analyzed: tha dad med par rig phyir ro //
